entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 28. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this evening. Temperature steady near minus 28. Wind chill near minus 41. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 31 in the afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming southwest 30 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 31 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 41 in the morning and minus 47 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 27 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 27 by morning. Wind chill minus 46 in the evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023
